summary: Adds a follower of stealth and speed to watch your back.
descriptionHtml:
Valkri is called the Leader of the Hunt because of his wolf like armor and speed with his dual knives. He is loyal and dedicated to watching your back in battle, he will fight to the end of his days to ensure your saftey.

the Leader of the Hunt can be found out back of the companions HQ, he will follow on command and carry the extra weight you cannot.

One bug has been found... the first time you see Valkri he will be armorless.... i cannot find a way to change this... if anyone has any suggestions they would be greatly appreciated.... 

the first time you meet Valkri ask him to follow you and access his inventory... and take one item from him, this should equip the rest of his equipment and when you give back the item you took it will be equipped as well.
author: Gthwlb
